[Desperate Prayer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1664) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You begin your turn and have no Focus Points in your pool.

</column>

---

You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid. You instantly recover 1 Focus Point.
